Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory672.jpg'}
{3: 'Following the commercial street, you reach a deserted area and stop in front of a small, forgotten shop.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory386.png'}

{3: 'This haunted house, decked out like a derelict hospital with splatters of fluorescent green and dark red paint, clearly aims for a spooky vibe that clashes hilariously with the festive atmosphere.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory351.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{3: 'Dodging the predictable jump scares, you push open the creaking door marked In Surgery at the back. Inside, a white figure lies sprawled on the operating table.'}
{3: 'Noticing you approaching, the figure shoots upâ€”sharp eyes glint beneath the disheveled white hair for a fleeting moment before reverting to a familiar nonchalant expression.'}
{2: "Who would've thought anyone'd actually sleep in a haunted house?", 3: '16', 4: 'Unbelievable...', 5: '16'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Look, it's peaceful here. No one bothers me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Perfect for catching some Z's when I'm relaxed... especially when there's not much going on.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Relaxing... in a place like this?', 3: '19'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Back in my internship days, I practically lived in the department office, always crashing there... Guess... Yawn... I just got used to it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The dimly lit room is crammed with dusty old medical equipment models. Aside from the fake cracks and grime, it is basically just a regular operating room.'}
{3: 'Seeing Wanshi curled up asleep earlier, though... this place probably means something totally different to him.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "It's alright.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "After all... this place isn't exactly terrifying.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Following his gaze, the topic subtly shifts. The prop was meant to be scary... well, now it is Wanshi's makeshift pillow on the operating table."}
{3: "It is a hilariously low-budget monster, but seeing Wanshi's usual calm expression, I can't help but feel more relaxed."}
{2: "Besides, I've seen weirder.", 3: '30', 4: 'Plus, the sign outside clearly says family-friendly haunted house.', 5: '30'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Hmm, yeah.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi yawns, stretches, and hops off the table, tilting his head with a hand on his neck.'}
{3: 'A faint popping sound, like knuckles cracking, fills the air.'}
{2: 'Sleeping in a weird position can do that to your neck, Dr. Wanshi.', 3: '35', 4: 'Fancy a massage?', 5: '37'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Constructs don't get stiff necks, kiddo.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Besides, giving a Construct a massage might take some special hands.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Barely awake from his groggy drowsiness, he squinted over.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Should've brought that pillow.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Carrying a pillow around everywhere's a bit much, wouldn't you say...", 3: '42', 4: 'Not the one I gave you, is it...', 5: '43'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "For me, a vacation's basically just sleeping somewhere new...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Yawn... that one's definitely the most comfortable.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'So, what brings the Gray Raven Commandant to this spooky dump?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Just here to pick up a lone Strike Hawk.', 3: '46', 4: "Passing through, that's all.", 5: '49'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Yeah, you found him. Now what?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Today happens to be Valentine's Day.", 3: '48'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Hmm... Sticking around with me for this festival might be a bit dull.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Is that so? Then how about you stay a while longer to make up for waking me up?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Though, it might get boring.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't think so.", 3: '52', 4: "Well, maybe boring isn't the right word.", 5: '52'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Well... that's classic you.", 4: '1'}
{2: "So, didn't you hit any of the events, Wanshi?", 3: '56'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'I did try my hand at the balloon shooting booth...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'But after I blasted through two whole ammo clips, the owner practically chased me off.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Probably thought you were there to wreck the joint, not win prizes...', 3: '60', 4: "You didn't go full-on battle mode, did you?", 5: '60'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Just wanted to practice a bit at first, but then these kids kept swarming me, begging for prizes... Couldn't exactly leave them hanging, could I?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The image of Wanshi surrounded by cheering kids, doling out prizes, pops into your head.'}
{2: 'Living up to your wish-granting reputation, I see.', 3: '63', 4: '(Although, seeing him babysit a bunch of kids is a first.)', 5: '63'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Anyway, all the prizes were gone except for this... Here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wanshi holds out a fluffy something.'}
{3: 'A little white owl plushie nestles in your palm, its golden eyes barely open, radiating pure contentment.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Yep, a gift for you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thank you.', 3: '69', 4: "Though, I don't have anything for you in return...", 5: '69'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Hmm, tell you what. Take this, and you're officially stuck with me for the rest of the day.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Uh-oh, I didn't see that coming.", 3: '71', 4: "Didn't I technically invite you first?", 5: '71'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'Just playing along, see?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alright, alright. How about we explore some other stuff?', 3: '73'}
{3: 'You flip open the guide Pulao shoved you, scanning for activities that are suitable for two.'}
{2: 'Snack stands, theaters, crafting workshops...', 3: '75', 4: 'Anything catch your eye, Wanshi?', 5: '75'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'This one.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Following Wanshi's finger, you land on a tiny booth description: Participate in a competition and win a legendary commandant's autographed, limited edition U-shaped pillow!"}
{2: 'Uh...', 3: '78', 4: 'Guess I missed that one...', 5: '78'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: 'It says... Gray Raven Commandant, huh?', 4: '1'}
{2: "Never thought they'd use that here...", 3: '80', 4: 'Blast it, why did I agree to sign all those things...', 5: '80'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Let's go check it out.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a mischievous glint replacing the drowsiness in his bright eyes, Wanshi snatches the guidebook from you.'}
{2: 'Wanshi', 3: "Looks like... there's a prize I gotta win after all.", 4: '1'}
